product_name: The North Face Hot Shot Daypack
long_description: Inspired by tough hiking packs, the streamlined Hot Shot from The North Face efficiently stores gear while you're hitting the pavement around town or traveling in remote locations. Large main compartment features an internal laptop sleeve (fits most 15 in. laptops); exterior zip pocket has a variety of organization compartments. Mesh side water bottle pockets keep hydration close-by (water bottles not included). Adjustable, padded shoulder straps and padded back panel offer load-carrying comfort; polyethylene sheet along back adds structure and support. Padded, winged hipbelt enhances carrying support and stability, and stows it cleanly away when you don't need it; sternum strap further stabilizes the pack. The North Face Hot Shot daypack also has an integrated reflective light loop, a daisy chain to lash on gear and a webbing carry handle. Endorsed by the American Chiropractic Association (ACA).
short_description: Inspired by tough hiking packs, the streamlined Hot Shot from The North Face efficiently stores gear while you're hitting the pavement around town or traveling in remote locations.
